rev.comment: Rm graphic; not used in this olympics and fails [[WP:NFCC]] #10c regardless
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1:
At the '''[[1908 Summer Olympics]]''', four '''[[sailing]] events''' were contested. Three were held from July 27, 1908 to July 29, 1908 on the [[Solent]] off the coast of [[Ryde]], while the 12 metre class contested its races on August 11, 1908 and August 12, 1908 on the [[River Clyde]]. The competitions were organised by the [[Royal Yachting Association|Yacht Racing Association]].
At the '''[[1908 Summer Olympics]]''', four '''[[sailing]] events''' were contested. Three were held from July 27, 1908 to July 29, 1908 on the [[Solent]] off the coast of [[Ryde]], while the 12 metre class contested its races on August 11, 1908 and August 12, 1908 on the [[River Clyde]]. The competitions were organised by the [[Royal Yachting Association|Yacht Racing Association]].
